steps: step 4: Click on link schedules -> Navigate to page 'team/*/project/*/grid'
step 5: Click on link settings -> Navigate to page 'team/*/project/*/settings'
step 6: Click on link testEnvironments -> Navigate to page 'team/*/project/*/agent'
step 7: Click on link scriptRepositories -> Navigate to page 'team/*/project/*/test-project'
step 8: Click on link executions -> Navigate to page 'team/*/project/*/test-runs'
step 9: Take full page screenshot as checkpoint
